query:
ALTER TABLE projects 
ADD COLUMN designLife INT AFTER lastCalculatedAt,
ADD COLUMN endOfLifeDate TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER designLife,
ADD COLUMN holdingDepartment VARCHAR(255) AFTER endOfLifeDate,
ADD COLUMN propertyManager VARCHAR(255) AFTER holdingDepartment,
ADD COLUMN managerEmail VARCHAR(320) AFTER propertyManager,
ADD COLUMN managerPhone VARCHAR(50) AFTER managerEmail,
ADD COLUMN facilityType VARCHAR(100) AFTER managerPhone,
ADD COLUMN occupancyStatus ENUM('occupied', 'vacant', 'partial') AFTER facilityType,
ADD COLUMN criticalityLevel ENUM('critical', 'important', 'standard') AFTER occupancyStatus;
